```{r}
library(here)
library(tidyverse)

df <- read_csv(here('./chap_03/data/ecls.csv'))
```


```{r}
df |>
    summarise(across(everything(), ~mean(is.na(.)))) |> 
    pivot_longer(cols=everything(), names_to = "variable", values_to = "pct_missing") |> 
    filter(pct_missing > 0) |> 
    arrange(desc(pct_missing))
```


Removed `childid`
```{r}
df <- df |> 
    select(-childid)
```


```{r}
df |> 
    na.omit() |> 
    nrow()
```

df |> head()
